video_title: The Problem With Positive Thoughts - Dr. Julie #shorts
transcript:
if you set yourself the rule that you
should only have positive thoughts i'm a
psychologist and i want you to know that
you're setting yourself up to feel like
a failure here's why you can't control
which thoughts pop into your head but
what you can do is choose how long you
spend with those thoughts once they
arrive and how much of your time and
attention you give to them so when those
negative thoughts do arrive instead of
criticizing yourself for not being a
positive person
notice the negative bias in the thought
and make a careful choice about whether
spending time with that thought is going
to help you or hinder you
